adj. 人工的；人造的；虚伪的；做作的；非自然存在的；人为的；假的；按约定而非随意的

n. 艺术创造技巧

bilingual.source: She looked more closely at the artwork.
bilingual.target: 她更仔细地看了看这些艺术品。

bilingual.source: The museum has a new artwork on display.
bilingual.target: 博物馆展出了一件新的艺术品。

bilingual.source: Please do not tch the artwork in the gallery.
bilingual.target: 请不要触摸画廊里的艺术品。

bilingual.source: This artwork is made by hollow out technique.
bilingual.target: 这件艺术品通过镂空技术制成。

bilingual.source: You should not tangi the artwork in the museum.
bilingual.target: 你不应该触摸博物馆里的艺术品。

bilingual.source: The strangeness of the artwork intrigued the visitors.
bilingual.target: 艺术品的奇怪吸引了参观者。

bilingual.source: The artwork is pendent from the gallery ceiling.
bilingual.target: 艺术品是悬挂的在画廊天花板上的。

bilingual.source: He admired the enameled artwork in the museum.
bilingual.target: 他欣赏了博物馆里的涂搪瓷的艺术品。

bilingual.source: The beauty of the artwork inheres in its simplicity.
bilingual.target: 这件艺术品的美固有于它的简洁。

bilingual.source: He decorated his office with plants and artwork.
bilingual.target: 他用植物和艺术品装饰了他的办公室。

yingyinNormal.en: Call us old-fashioned, but we don't like it when people take hammers to our artwork.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说我们老古董也行，但是我们不喜欢人们用锤子砸我们的艺术品。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Honor, a transformative artwork must, by definition, be transformative.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官阁下，改编作品按照定义必须进行改编。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, for starters, you might want to rethink some of this artwork. I mean, this woman's actually on a leash like a dog.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先呢，你得重新考量一下店里的摆设，比如这个女人像条狗一样被链子拴住。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my God. I know. And the worst part was, they took my backpack which had all the original artwork I've done for my own comic book, Science Boy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，我的天啊。我知道，最糟糕的是他们抢走了我的背包，里面有我自己画的漫画，《科学小子》。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a work of art, especially one in a museum

examination_example.sentence: Museums stopped exhibiting some of Gilardi's <highlight>artworks</highlight> to prevent them from further damage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 博物馆停止展出一些吉拉蒂的艺术品，以防止它们受到进一步的损害。

examination_example.sentence: When younger kids learn computer science, they learn that it's a tool to build apps, or create <highlight>artwork</highlight>, or test hypotheses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当年幼的孩子们学习计算机科学时，他们了解到它是一种构建应用程序、创作艺术作品或测试假设的工具软件。

examination_example.sentence: What are Von Wong's <highlight>artworks</highlight> intended for?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Von Wong的作品旨在表达什么？

examination_example.sentence: Every straw that's part of Von Wong's <highlight>artwork</highlight> likely came from a drink that someone used for only a few minutes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Von Wong的作品中的每一根吸管很可能都来自于一个只喝了几分钟的饮料。

examination_example.sentence: Social bonds are created among individuals when they share their expression of common values through <highlight>artworks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过作品表达共同的价值观，可以在个人之间建立社会纽带。

examination_example.sentence: The company turned used chopsticks into furniture and other <highlight>artworks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司将用过的筷子变成了家具和其他艺术品。

examination_example.sentence: But he kept painting and he painted more than 2,000 <highlight>artworks</highlight> in the following ten years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但他坚持画画，在接下来的十年里，他画了2000多幅作品。

examination_example.sentence: If you want to buy the <highlight>artworks</highlight> online, which one can you get in the shortest time?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想在网上购买艺术品，你能在最短的时间内得到哪个？
